itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway go live for the inauguration of Joe Biden and Kamala Harris to break down the ceremony, comment on Joe Biden’s speech, Lady Gaga’s national anthem, J-Lo’s performance, Amanda Gorman’s poetry reading, and what the Biden adm...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway go live for the inauguration of Joe Biden and Kamala Harris to break down the ceremony, comment on Joe Biden’s speech, Lady Gaga’s national anthem, J-Lo’s performance, Amanda Gorman’s poetry reading, and what the Biden administration will do going forward — plus Dan explains why all politicians are full of shit.
